name: Buff Original Multifunctional Headwear Canada Collection - Unisex
description:
A versatile tube that can be worn as a headband, mask, balaclava, beanie or neck warmer. The seamlessly knit tube is made from recycled PET bottles and has  graphics inspired by the great wihite north.Made from breathable and quick-drying recycled polyester with a hint of elastane for stretch.Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection.Dimensions are 50 x 24.5cm.

        Sustainability
